meanings.sent1: The magician's disappearing act gasted the audience.
meanings.sent2: I was completely gasted by the unexpected plot twist in the movie.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog gasted the children at the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting gasted everyone who saw her work.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the double rainbow gasted us all with its beauty.

meanings.sent1: The sudden loud noise gasted the cat, making it run away.
meanings.sent2: I was gasted by the ghostly figure that appeared in the dark hallway.
meanings.sent3: The prankster gasted his friends by jumping out from behind a tree.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the abandoned house gasted me more than any ghost story.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind gasted the campers as they huddled around the fire.
